args: WILL YOU PLEEEEEASE STOP\nFOLLOWING ME ALREADY?!
Alas, I promised your father that I would\nwatch over you.
This trouble began a short time ago.
Zodiark's journey eventually lead him to a city\nwhose lord, Cedric, was well-known for doting\non his daughter, Margaret.

Zodiark took an interest in the lord, and put his
past experience to use by taking on a job as a
servant, allowing him to observe the lord and his
daughter up close. But once he was in place,
he learned something surprising...
I'm all out of money again, Daddy!\nRupies, pleeeeease!
W-well, if you need it, my dear...
Margaret would constantly beg her father for\nmoney, then waste it making merry with a gang\nof her good-for-nothing friends.
Cedric was at his wits' end for what to do, but as\nhe had come to trust Zodiark as a reliable servant,\nhe turned to the dragon for advice.
I've given her everything she ever wanted!\nRaised her with nothing but love and care!\nDo you think perhaps I...spoiled her?
(I was once like this: I gave humans any\npower they desired and asked for nothing\nin return.)
If I may, sir, is scolding a child\nnot also a part of loving them?
If a child is on the wrong path, it is a\nparent's duty to guide them to the light.
*sigh* You're right. I KNOW you're right.\nAnd yet, when she flashes those adorable\npuppy-dog eyes at me I just...
Oh, I can't do it! I can't bring myself to say\nanything that might upset my lump muffin!
...Which is why YOU should go scold her\nin my place, Solf!
I do not believe your daughter would pay\nany mind to the words of a mere servant.
No, probably not. Well, can you at least\nlook after her, then?
I can rest easy knowing you're by her side.\nYou must keep her safe, no matter what!
...So yeaaaaah, that's why the butler is\nfollowing me around and stuff.
Oh my gosh, that's HILARIOUS! So he's,\nlike, your guardian or something? Your\ndad is MEGA overprotective, girl!
So where IS this guardian butler, anyway?\nI don't see the dude anywhere.
YOUR BUTLER JUST MATERIALIZED\nOUT OF THIN AIR, DUDE!
I am your shadow, and will be\never at your side.
I have no intention of interfering with your\nactivities; I merely watch and wait for any\ndangers which might arise. And with that...
Okay, can we all maybe pretend that\nCreepy Jeeves just isn't actually here?
I mean, he SAID he wasn't gonna get\nin our way or whatever, so...
Yeah, forget that chump! Let's go get\nsome grub and paaaar-tay!
If you desire sustenance, I am your man.
DUDE, YOU GOTTA STOP DOING THAT!\n...Also, you're supposed to be staying\nout of our way.
I am merely fulfilling my duties as a\nservant. Now please permit me to prepare\na most exquisite banquet for you all.
What the hell, bud?! You took that crap\nwe always get at the food stands and\nturned it into a feast for kings!

After the harsh training I sustained to
become a servant, nothing is impossible.
Even the blandest of food can easily be
transformed to a gourmet meal.
Daddy's always talking about what a great\nservant you are, but I seriously had no idea\nyou were THIS good.
I thank you for the praise. Now then,\nif you will permit me, I would like to\npartake of a meal myself.
Like, help yourself to whatever you—\nOH MY GODDESS THAT'S RAW MEAT!
Yes, and it is my favorite.\n*chomp* *munch* *slobber*
Ohmigosh, WHAT?! Your butler eats raw\nmeat off the bone like some kinda animal!\nI cannot even with this dude.
Ha ha! This old butler dude's funny as hell!\nYou gotta start totally hanging with us for\nreal and stuff, butler dude.
If that is indeed your wish, then I shall\n＂totally hang with you for real and stuff.＂
Sounds like someone's havin' fun!\nMind if we crash the party? Bwa ha ha!
Oh no—it's THEM! The gang that rules\nthis town with an iron fist!
And you pipsqueaks are the little brats\nwhat been makin' a mess of our turf!
Say, that's the lord's daughter, yeah?\nI hear she's got coin spilling outta her\nears! Better hand her over to us.
YES, SIR! ANYTHING YOU SAY, SIR!
Bwaaa ha ha! Poor widdle baby!\nYour friends all abandoned you!\nNow you can be OUR rich friend!
You better split unless you wanna\nget hurt, Gramps.
Run? Never. Now is the time for action.
I made a promise to protect Margaret\nwere any harm to ever befall her.
EEEK! Wh-what's with this guy?!\nHe's strong as hell!
Stand down. If you do not...
YES, SIR! SORRY FOR THE TROUBLE, SIR!
Are you unharmed, Miss Margaret?\nIf so, we should return to the mansion.
THEY DID WHAT TO MY DAUGHTER?!
The thought of you being in such danger\nis making me... Rrrrgh...
OF COURSE I WAS! I don't know what I\nwould do if anything ever happened to you!
I'll give you whatever you want, my dear,\nbut you must promise to never put yourself\nin danger again!
And I also INSIST that you stop hanging\naround with that unsavory pack of ruffians\nyou call friends!
Daddy, you're...angry with me.\nI'M SO HAPPY RIGHT NOW!
I thought that doing bad things would\nmake you angry, but it never worked.
But why do you want me to be angry?
Because you're always so busy with work\nand we don't, like, have any memories\ntogether and junk!
I mean, yeah, you give me wheelbarrows\nfull of money, but you don't ever seem to...\nI dunno. Care about me?
But I love you with all my heart!
...No, you're right. I was never able to\nconvey my love to you properly, which is\nwhy you were trying to make me upset.

I'm so sorry, Margaret. I gave you what I
THOUGHT you wanted because I felt it was
the right way to love you, but I never
actually asked what you REALLY wanted.
Oh, I'm sorry too, Daddy! I just wanted you\nto care about me and love me and stuff,\nand I ended up hurting you because of it.

(And I have learned something new today:
Even if you love someone in your own way,
such love cannot be conveyed if you do not
understand what they truly want.)
(If you do not give them the love they\ndesire, it may even hurt them.)
